testcase.classname: SingUp | user should be able to add items to the cart and to sign up with new account
testcase.name: user should be able to add items and signUp
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to home page............................................passed When User add 2 items to the cart...........................................passed And user click on view cart to proceed checkout.............................passed And user add valid name and email to register...............................passed And user fill all his account details with "ACCOUNT CREATED!"...............passed When user navigate to the cart page and proceed to checkout.................passed And user add random data for payment and download the invoice...............passed

testcase.classname: SingUp | user should be able to sign up new account with Random data
testcase.name: user should be able to signUp with Random data
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to URL home page........................................passed When user signUp and register with Random test data.........................passed Then user signUp successfully with Random data "ACCOUNT CREATED!"...........passed
